title.narrative: Supporting the Philippines to enhance transparency and integrity through increased reporting and evidence gathering of corruption

description.narrative: The project is designed to create, by February 2017, a crowd sourcing platform and social media campaign that will reach more than five million people, get 100,000 people to pledge to report corrupt acts, generate at least 2,000 citizen reports of bribery and other forms of corruption, and provide evidence for the filing of administrative or criminal cases; leading to greater transparency and integrity in government.
